010package imagingbook.common.histogram;
011
012/**
013 * Represents a "cumulative distribution function" that is piecewise linear.
014 * @author WB
015 *
016 */
017public class PiecewiseLinearCdf {
018        private int K;
019        private int[] iArr;
020        private double[] pArr;
021        
022        /**
023         * Constructor creating a {@link PiecewiseLinearCdf} from a sequence of 
024         * brightness / probability pairs.
025         * 
026         * @param K number of brightness values (typ. 256)
027         * @param ik a sequence of brightness values serving as control points
028         * @param Pk a sequence of probability values, one for each control point
029         */
030        public PiecewiseLinearCdf(int K, int[] ik, double[] Pk) {
031                this.K = K; // number of intensity values (typ. 256)
032                int N = ik.length;
033                iArr = new int[N + 2];          // array of intensity values
034                pArr = new double[N + 2];       // array of cum. distribution values
035                iArr[0] = -1; 
036                pArr[0] = 0;
037                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
038                        iArr[i + 1] = ik[i];
039                        pArr[i + 1] = Pk[i];
040                }
041                iArr[N + 1] = K - 1;
042                pArr[N + 1] = 1;
043        }
044        
045        double getCdf(int i) {
046                if (i < 0)
047                        return 0;
048                else if (i >= K - 1)
049                        return 1;
050                else {
051                        int s = 0, N = iArr.length - 1;
052                        for (int j = 0; j <= N; j++) { // find s (segment index)
053                                if (iArr[j] <= i)
054                                        s = j;
055                                else
056                                        break;
057                        }
058                        return pArr[s] + (i - iArr[s])
059                                        * ((pArr[s + 1] - pArr[s]) / (iArr[s + 1] - iArr[s]));
060                }
061        }
062        
063        int getInverseCdf(double z) {
064                if (z < getCdf(0))
065                        return 0;
066                else if (z >= 1)
067                        return K - 1;
068                else {
069                        int r = 0, N = iArr.length - 1;
070                        for (int j = 0; j <= N; j++) { // find r (segment index)
071                                if (pArr[j] <= z)
072                                        r = j;
073                                else
074                                        break;
075                        }
076                        return (int) Math.round(iArr[r] + (z - pArr[r])
077                                        * ((iArr[r + 1] - iArr[r]) / (pArr[r + 1] - pArr[r])));
078                }
079        }
080        
081        // for testing only:
082        public double[] getPdf() {      
083                double[] prob = new double[K];
084                prob[0] =  getCdf(0);
085                for (int i = 1; i < K; i++) {
086                        prob[i] =  getCdf(i) - getCdf(i-1);
087                }
088                return prob;
089        }
090        
091}
